name: Carnificina
firstNightReminder: Wake up the Carnificina and have them choose 3 living players. Put a Prey token on each of those players. Put the Aware token on one of those players and wake them up. Show them Carnificina token and the 2 other chosen players.
otherNightReminder: If all players with Prey tokens on them live, put a Dead token on 2 of them. If at least 1 of the players with a Prey token on them is dead, instead put a Dead token on any living player. Then remove all Prey tokens. Wake up the Carnificina and have them choose 3 living players. Put a Prey token on each of those players. Put the Aware token on one of those players and wake them up. Show them Carnificina token and the 2 other chosen players.
ability: Each night, choose 3 living players: One learns the rest. Next night, if all live, two die. Otherwise, a player dies.
